original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste gang gi phyir las kyi bsgrub pa 'dis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po nyid du gyur pa'i rgyu des na 'byor ba thams cad dgug pa dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi rgyun te rab 'byams dag pa
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste gang gi phyir las kyi bsgrub pa 'dis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po nyid du gyur pa'i rgyu des na 'byor ba thams cad dgug pa dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi rgyun te rab 'byams dag pa
translated: The word because is the reason, because this accomplishment of the rite is the cause of becoming ƒÄkƒÅ≈õagarbha himself. Therefore, the stream of all the rites of summoning and accomplishing prosperity and so forth is boundless,

original: ste ; mchog tu gyur pa rab tu phye ste bshad par bya'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ste ; mchog tu gyur pa rab tu phye ste bshad par bya'o zhes bya'o //
translated: that is, supreme, and is to be revealed, that is, explained.

original: dngos grub chen po kun grub ba //üîΩgo rims ji bzhin rab bshad bya //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po kun grub ba // go rims ji bzhin rab bshad bya //
translated: The accomplishment of all great powersüîΩis to be explained in order,

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: as has been explained.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
translated: The words that is to say have the meaning of indicating.

original: 'byor ba thams cad dgug pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba thams cad dgug pa ni sbyor ba thams cad dgug pa'o //
analyzed: 'byor ba thams cad dgug pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba thams cad dgug pa ni sbyor ba thams cad dgug pa'o //
translated: As for summoning all consecrations and so forth, summoning all consecrations means summoning all the yogas.

original: dbang bskur ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen bo dang lha mo chen mo spyan drang ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen bo dang lha mo chen mo spyan drang ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Consecration means inviting the great bodhisattvas and great goddesses, as is the meaning of the words.

original: de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dbye bas rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod bas na de'i phyir thams cad ces bshad do //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dbye bas rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod bas na de'i phyir thams cad ces bshad do //
translated: Moreover, since it is of various kinds by the division of the mundane and supramundane initiations, therefore it is explained as ‚Äúall.‚Äù

original: gzhug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: ‚Äú Introduction‚Äù and so forth are easy to understand.

original: 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is this all done?

original: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúby the initiation of the Vajra Gem.‚Äù

original: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now its definition is explained.

original: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag pas nam mkha' las thams cad bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag pas nam mkha' las thams cad bsgoms pas so //
translated: Having arisen from the vajra-palms, the vajra-gem is placed in the place of initiation, and all things are imagined in space.

original: 'di ni 'di skad ston pa yin te de bzhin du de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la tram zhes bya ba zlos shing /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di skad ston pa yin te de bzhin du de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la tram zhes bya ba zlos shing /
translated: This is what is being taught: Having practiced the procedure up to the end of the reality, doctrine, and vow-commitments, one recites ‚Äútra·πÉ.‚Äù

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'byor ba thams cad dgug pa'i bsam pas mdzod spu'i gnas su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po bzlas par byas te de lta bus ni 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa sgrub pa'o //üîΩde bzhin du thams cad byas la sbyor ba ma thams cad @351a * //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'byor ba thams cad dgug pa'i bsam pas mdzod spu'i gnas su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po bzlas par byas te de lta bus ni 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa sgrub pa'o // de bzhin du thams cad byas la sbyor ba ma thams cad @351a * //
translated: Having formed the pledge seal of the jewel vajra, one should place it on the brow, with the thought of summoning all wealth, and repeat the essence-mantra of the Blessed One. By this means one accomplishes the summoning of all wealth.

original: dgug pa'i bsam pas bzlas brjod byas te /
analyzed: dgug pa'i bsam pas bzlas brjod byas te /
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should repeat the mantra with the thought of summoning all women.

original: de lta bus ni sbyor ba thams cad gzhug pa bsgrub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni sbyor ba thams cad gzhug pa bsgrub bo //
translated: By this means one accomplishes the summoning of all women.üîΩHaving done everything in the same way, one should repeat the mantra with the thought of binding all wealth.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la 'byor ba thams cad bcing ba'i bsam pas bzlas shing de lta bus ni 'byor pa thams cad 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la 'byor ba thams cad bcing ba'i bsam pas bzlas shing de lta bus ni 'byor pa thams cad 'grub pa'o //
translated: By this means one accomplishes all wealth.

original: dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas ni dbang du byed do //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas ni dbang du byed do //
translated: With the thought of subjugating, one subjugates.

original: dbrog pa'i bsam pas ni dbrog pa'o //
analyzed: dbrog pa'i bsam pas ni dbrog pa'o //
translated: With the thought of stealing, one steals.

original: nye bar sogs pa'i bsam pas ni bsags pa'o //üîΩlen pa'i bsam pas ni len to //
analyzed: nye bar sogs pa'i bsam pas ni bsags pa'o // len pa'i bsam pas ni len to //
translated: With the thought of gathering, one gathers.üîΩWith the thought of taking, one takes.

original: 'dren pa'i bsam pas ni 'dren to //
analyzed: 'dren pa'i bsam pas ni 'dren to //
translated: With the thought of leading, one leads.

original: dgug pa'i bsam pas ni 'gugs so //üîΩgtong ba'i bsam pas ni gtong ngo //
analyzed: dgug pa'i bsam pas ni 'gugs so // gtong ba'i bsam pas ni gtong ngo //
translated: With the intention to summon, one summons.üîΩWith the intention to release, one releases.

original: 'jig pa'i bsam pas ni 'jig go //üîΩ'phen pa'i bsam pas ni 'phen to //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i bsam pas ni 'jig go // 'phen pa'i bsam pas ni 'phen to //
translated: With the intention to destroy, one destroys.üîΩWith the intention to impel, one impels.

original: 'degs pa'i bsam pas ni 'degs so //üîΩ'bebs pa'i bsam pas ni 'bebs so //üîΩbrdeg pa'i bsam pas ni brdeg go //
analyzed: 'degs pa'i bsam pas ni 'degs so // 'bebs pa'i bsam pas ni 'bebs so // brdeg pa'i bsam pas ni brdeg go //
translated: With the intention to lift, one lifts.üîΩWith the intention to lower, one lowers.üîΩWith the intention to strike, one strikes.

original: sbyang ba'i bsam pas ni sbyang ngo //
analyzed: sbyang ba'i bsam pas ni sbyang ngo //
translated: With the intention to purify, one purifies.

original: rnyed pa'i bsam bas ni rnyed pa bsgrub bo //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i bsam bas ni rnyed pa bsgrub bo //
translated: With the intention to obtain, one accomplishes the attainment of wealth.

original: rim gyis sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni rim gyis sgrub bo //
analyzed: rim gyis sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni rim gyis sgrub bo //
translated: With the intention to accomplish gradually, one accomplishes gradually.

original: 'tsho ba sgrub pa'i bsam pas 'tsho ba sgrub bo //
analyzed: 'tsho ba sgrub pa'i bsam pas 'tsho ba sgrub bo //
translated: With the intention to accomplish livelihood, one accomplishes livelihood.

original: kun du 'gyed pa'i bsam pas 'gyed pa sgrub bo //üîΩ'byor pa dgod pa'i bsam pas ni nye bar dgod pa sgrub bo //
analyzed: kun du 'gyed pa'i bsam pas 'gyed pa sgrub bo // 'byor pa dgod pa'i bsam pas ni nye bar dgod pa sgrub bo //
translated: With the intention to accomplish distribution, one accomplishes distribution.üîΩWith the intention to establish prosperity, one establishes it.

original: brtan par bya ba'i bsam pas ni brtan par byed par sgrub bo //
analyzed: brtan par bya ba'i bsam pas ni brtan par byed par sgrub bo //
translated: With the intention to stabilize, one stabilizes.

original: rdo rjer byed pa'i bsam pas ni rdo rjer byed do //
analyzed: rdo rjer byed pa'i bsam pas ni rdo rjer byed do //
translated: With the intention to make vajra-like, one makes vajra-like.

original: 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni 'byor pa thams cad sgrub bo //
analyzed: 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni 'byor pa thams cad sgrub bo //
translated: With the thought of accomplishing all powers, one accomplishes all powers.

original: 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: With the thought of accomplishing the supreme of all powers, one accomplishes the supreme of all powers.

original: dpal thams cad dgug ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha mo gter gyi rin po che ni dpal te /
analyzed: dpal thams cad dgug ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha mo gter gyi rin po che ni dpal te /
translated: As for all glories, etc., the goddess Nidhirddhiratna is glory.

original: da yang gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis dbye ba mtha' yas pas na dpal thams cad ces bya'o //
analyzed: da yang gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis dbye ba mtha' yas pas na dpal thams cad ces bya'o //
translated: Moreover, since the distinctions of the disciples' aspirations are infinite, all glories are said to be infinite.

original: de dgug pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de dgug pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: As for summoning them, etc., it is as before.

original: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one do all of that?

original: rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: With the glorious jewel vajra.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad de bzhin du rjes su spyad la rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yi ge tram gis rang gis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su yang dag par
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad de bzhin du rjes su spyad la rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yi ge tram gis rang gis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su yang dag par
translated: One should practice all the rites of consecration and so forth in the same way, and with the pledge seal of the jewel arisen from the vajra palm, with the syllable tram, one should perfectly place it on one‚Äôs own place of empowerment.

original: bzhag la yang dpal @351b thams cad dgug pa'i bsam pas ni dpal thams cad 'gugs pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzhag la yang dpal @351b thams cad dgug pa'i bsam pas ni dpal thams cad 'gugs pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, with the thought of summoning all splendors, one will accomplish the summoning of all splendors.

original: dpal thams cad gzhug pa'i bsam pas ni dpal thams cad 'jug pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: dpal thams cad gzhug pa'i bsam pas ni dpal thams cad 'jug pa 'grub bo //
translated: With the thought of inducting all splendors, one will accomplish the inducting of all splendors.

original: 'ching ba'i bsam pas ni 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: 'ching ba'i bsam pas ni 'ching ba'o //
translated: With the thought of binding, one will bind.

original: dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas ni dbang du byed do //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas ni dbang du byed do //
translated: With the thought of controlling, one will control.

original: 'phrog ba'i bsam pas ni 'phrog go //üîΩnye bar sogs pa'i bsam pas ni nye bar sog go //
analyzed: 'phrog ba'i bsam pas ni 'phrog go // nye bar sogs pa'i bsam pas ni nye bar sog go //
translated: With the thought of stealing, one will steal.üîΩWith the thought of gathering, one will gather.

original: len pa'i bsam pas ni len to //
analyzed: len pa'i bsam pas ni len to //
translated: With the thought of taking, one will take.

original: 'dren pa'i bsam pas ni 'dren to //
analyzed: 'dren pa'i bsam pas ni 'dren to //
translated: With the thought of leading, one will lead.

original: 'od du gzhug pa'i bsam pas ni 'od du gzhug go //
analyzed: 'od du gzhug pa'i bsam pas ni 'od du gzhug go //
translated: With the thought of causing to enter light, one will cause to enter light.

original: khyer du gzhug pa'i bsam bas ni khyer du gzhug go //üîΩ'jig pa'i bsam pas ni 'jig go //
analyzed: khyer du gzhug pa'i bsam bas ni khyer du gzhug go // 'jig pa'i bsam pas ni 'jig go //
translated: By the intention to take up, one takes up.üîΩBy the intention to destroy, one destroys.

original: btang snyoms su 'jog pa'i bsam pas ni btang snyoms su 'jog go //üîΩ'dzud pa'i bsam pas ni 'dzud do //
analyzed: btang snyoms su 'jog pa'i bsam pas ni btang snyoms su 'jog go // 'dzud pa'i bsam pas ni 'dzud do //
translated: By the intention to remain indifferent, one remains indifferent.üîΩBy the intention to enter, one enters.

original: kun du bsnun pa'i bsam pas ni brdeg go //
analyzed: kun du bsnun pa'i bsam pas ni brdeg go //
translated: By the intention to strike, one strikes.

original: sbyong ba'i bsam bas ni sbyong ngo //
analyzed: sbyong ba'i bsam bas ni sbyong ngo //
translated: By the intention to purify, one purifies.

original: rnyed pa'i bsam pas ni rnyed pa grub bo //üîΩ'tshong ba'i sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni 'tshong pa sgrub bo //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i bsam pas ni rnyed pa grub bo // 'tshong ba'i sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni 'tshong pa sgrub bo //
translated: By the intention to acquire, one acquires.üîΩBy the intention to accomplish the sale, one accomplishes the sale.

original: dgod pa'i bsam pas ni yang dag par dgod do //
analyzed: dgod pa'i bsam pas ni yang dag par dgod do //
translated: By the intention to place, one places.

original: nye bar sbyor ba'i bsam pas ni nye bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba'i bsam pas ni nye bar sbyor ro //
translated: By the intention to apply, one applies.

original: brtan par byed pa'i bsam pas ni brtan par byed do //
analyzed: brtan par byed pa'i bsam pas ni brtan par byed do //
translated: By the intention to stabilize, one stabilizes.

original: rdo rjer bya ba'i bsam pas ni rdo rjer byed do //
analyzed: rdo rjer bya ba'i bsam pas ni rdo rjer byed do //
translated: By the intention to make adamantine, one makes adamantine.

original: bsgrub pa'i bsam pas ni sgrub bo //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i bsam pas ni sgrub bo //
translated: By the intention to accomplish, one accomplishes.

original: mchog sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni mchog sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchog sgrub pa'i bsam pas ni mchog sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the intention to accomplish the supreme, one accomplishes the supreme.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha mo nor bu chen mo ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na phun sum tshogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha mo nor bu chen mo ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na phun sum tshogs pa thams cad do //
translated: With respect to summoning all perfections, and so on, the goddess Ma·πái is the nature of all mundane and supramundane perfections, and so all perfections.

original: de nas dgug pa la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de nas dgug pa la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Then, how does one summon and so on?

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa'i bsam pas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po bzlas par byas te /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa'i bsam pas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po bzlas par byas te /
translated: Thus, one should form the vajra jewel seal, and place it on the site of the ≈´r·πáƒÅ, and recite the essence mantra of the Blessed One with the intention of summoning all perfections.

analyzed: de lta bus ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug par bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will accomplish the summoning of all perfections.

original: @352a * // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad gzhug pa'i bsam bas ni gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: @352a * // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad gzhug pa'i bsam bas ni gzhug pa'o //

original: bcing ba'i bsam pas ni bcing ba'o //
analyzed: bcing ba'i bsam pas ni bcing ba'o //
translated: With the intention of binding, one should bind.üîΩ With the intention of controlling, one should control.üîΩ With the intention of satisfying, one should satisfy.

original: dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas ni dbang du byed do //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas ni dbang du byed do //
translated: With the intention of subjugating, one subjugates.

analyzed: de bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi dam par bsgrub pa'i bsam pas ni dam bar bsgrub pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal bo //

analyzed: bla na med pa'i lha mo ni /
translated: is the unsurpassed goddess.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
translated: Since she is the nature of all supramundane offerings,

original: mchod pa thams cad de /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad de /
translated: she is all offerings.

original: de dgug pa la sogs pa ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de dgug pa la sogs pa ni de bzhin no //
translated: Summoning her and so on is just like that.

original: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /üîΩrdo rje rin chen mchod pas so //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / rdo rje rin chen mchod pas so //
translated: How is all this done?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la yi ge tram zlos shing rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcings nas mchod pa thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la yi ge tram zlos shing rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcings nas mchod pa thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: rang gi rgyal mchog lan cig grub //

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rang gi phyag rgya'i mchog ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rang gi phyag rgya'i mchog ste /
translated: This is the vajra-jewel pledge seal, one‚Äôs supreme seal.

original: de yang yi ge tram zlos shing //
analyzed: de yang yi ge tram zlos shing //
translated: And that is accomplished by repeating the syllable tram,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i tshul 'dzin par mdzad pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i tshul 'dzin par mdzad pa /
translated: and by the Blessed One Vajrasattva assuming the manner of ƒÄkƒÅ≈õagarbha,

analyzed: rang dbang du byas la 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa'i las brgyab pa bsgrub pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: and by one‚Äôs own subjugation, and by being definitely applied to the accomplishment of the rites such as summoning all the riches, and so forth.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pa dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / mchod pa rnams thob par 'dun pa ni bsam pa thams cad do ;
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pa dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / mchod pa rnams thob par 'dun pa ni bsam pa thams cad do ;
translated: The thought of all wishes is the wish for the attainment of mundane and supramundane riches, glory, and excellence, and for the attainment of worship.

original: / de'i rdzogs pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
analyzed: / de'i rdzogs pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
translated: Its completion is its actualization.

original: de'i don gyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin chen rtog pa yang yin la cho ga yang yin pas na /
analyzed: de'i don gyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin chen rtog pa yang yin la cho ga yang yin pas na /
translated: The Bhagavat Akasagarbhavajraratna is the thought, and also the rite.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the rite of the thought which fulfills all wishes.

original: de'i rgyas pa ni sgrub pa dang bsgrub bar bya ba sna tshogs kyi rgyun no //
analyzed: de'i rgyas pa ni sgrub pa dang bsgrub bar bya ba sna tshogs kyi rgyun no //
translated: Its expansion is the continuity of the various accomplishments and things to be accomplished.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa /
translated: The Extensive Explanation of the ShriparamƒÅdya

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las /
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom called ‚ÄúThe Arising‚Äù

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Explanation of the Thought of the Noble Akasagarbha is completed.
